  3. Ben Vane

Ben Vane

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

One of the Arrochar Alps, Ben Vane only just makes Munro status but has great character, with very steep and rocky slopes on all sides. Bealachs with other peaks are very low and Ben Vane is usually climbed on its own.

 You have not climbed Ben Vane.

Region: Loch Lomond

Altitude: 915 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 3.70/5
Rating: 3.7/5 (195 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Ben Vane from Inveruglas

Other routes and challenges

Continuing from Ben Vane, it is possible to descent very steeply and reascent to reach Beinn Ime and Beinn Narnain; however the terrain between is very rough and much more demanding than the normal routes amongst the Arrochar Alps.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Arrochar Hotels

Arrochar B&B

Arrochar Cottages

Loch Lomond Hostels
